articles.description: VISCERAL fat wraps around abdominal organs, raising the risk of heart disease, Alzheimer's, diabetes, and stroke. One drink has been shown to shed the dangerous belly fat.
articles.content:
"Abdominal fat area, body weight and composition were measured at week zero, week eight, and week 12," the researchers noted.
Out of 118 participants, 104 people completed the three-month trial.

articles.title: New Research Shows How Health Risks to Children Mount as Temperatures Rise - The New York Times
articles.description: The first nationwide study on rising temperatures and younger Americans found that hotter days were associated with more visits to emergency rooms.
articles.content: It is well established that days of extreme heat are dangerous for adults and can lead to excess deaths, particularly in vulnerable populations like older people. When temperatures rise, people can b… [+2262 chars]
